name: Bukima Tented Camp
description: Just outside the Virunga National Park boundary lays the Bukima tented camp, which is the main starting point Virunga mountain gorilla treks. The camp was originally built for researchers, but is now used primarily by trekkers. As the name suggests, overnight guests at Bukima sleep in platform tents, but by camping standards they are quite plush. Each tent features an adjoining bathroom with running water and a nicely appointed bed and dresser for clothes. The views from the tent sites – or anywhere in camp for that matter – are spectacular. To the south, the view is dominated by Mt. Mikeno, whose 4437m (14,560’) summit towers over the gorilla sector. Across the valley is Nyiragongo volcano, whose lava lake colors the night sky with a red glow. Every few years, Nyamulagira volcano erupts and steals the nighttime show by spewing hot lava hundreds of feet into the air. Occasionally, the mountain gorillas themselves wander into the Bukima tented camp.

name: Virunga National Park - Mount Nyiragongo & Mountain Gorilla Treks
description: Virunga National Park is a UNESCO World Heritage Site located in the eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, on the border of Uganda and Rwanda. Virunga is Africa’s oldest national park and is also the continent’s most biologically diverse protected area. The park’s 7800 square kilometers (3000 square miles) includes forests, savannas, lava plains, swamps, erosion valleys, active volcanoes, and the glaciated peaks of the Rwenzori mountains. Virunga is home to about a quarter of the world’s critically endangered mountain gorillas. The park’s two other Great Ape species, eastern lowland Grauer’s gorillas and chimpanzees, make Virunga the only park in the world to host three taxa of Great Apes. Another prominent inhabitant of the park is the Okapi, an endangered species that resembles a zebra but is more closely related to the giraffe. Large colonies of hippopotami, forest and savanna elephants, lions, and numerous rare bird species can also be found in the park.

name: Bougainvilla Guesthouse
description: Bougainvilla is an established and very popular South African guesthouse, restaurant and bar – well-known between locals and expats as a home from home in the heart of Lubumbashi. The Bartz family came to the DRC in 2003, and settled in Lubumbashi. Their first business was importing good quality meat products into the country which evolved into guesthouses and eventually Bougainvilla since 2007. At this colourful hotspot you can indulge in delicious South African as well as local foods, wines, privacy, hospitality and a viby atmosphere on the veranda, at the fireside, on the pool deck and in the brand new bar – some of the many virtues Bougainvilla has to offer. The homely community considers every guest as part of the family. Your stay at Bougainvilla will be one of wholesomeness and convenience – something not to forget. You will be ideally situated in town and be catered for in all your needs. Best of all – we speak your language! You will enjoy life at Bougainvilla, not just living it. If you’re looking for a luxury guest house in Kinshasa, look no further than Sunny Day Guest House.
Close to some of Kinshasa's most popular landmarks, such as Paroisse Sainte Anne (2.0 mi) and Symphonie des Arts (2.6 mi), Sunny Day Guest House is a great destination for tourists.

name: Hotel Emilton Saint Jean
description:
Hotel Emilton Saint Jean is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Kinshasa, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Rooms at Hotel Emilton Saint Jean offer a refrigerator, air conditioning, and a minibar providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk is one of the conveniences offered at this small hotel. A lounge will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Hotel Emilton Saint Jean, free parking is available.
Nearby landmarks such as Paroisse Sainte Anne (2.1 mi) and Symphonie des Arts (2.8 mi) make Hotel Emilton Saint Jean a great place to stay when visiting Kinshasa.
During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Kinshasa shawarma restaurant such as Al'Dar, which is a short distance from Hotel Emilton Saint Jean.
If you’re looking for something to do, Cathédrale Notre-Dame Du Congo (0.4 mi) is a nice way to spend some time, and it is within walking distance of Hotel Emilton Saint Jean.
Enjoy your stay in Kinshasa!

name: Hotel Fortune
description:
Finding an ideal small hotel in Kinshasa does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel Fortune, a nice option for travelers like you.
Close to Cathédrale Notre-Dame Du Congo (2.0 mi), a popular Kinshasa landmark, Hotel Fortune is a great destination for tourists.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a refrigerator, a minibar, and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the small hotel.
Hotel Fortune features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a lounge. If you are driving to Hotel Fortune, free parking is available.
Travelers looking for French restaurants can head to Le Caf Conc, Chez Gaby, or Patisserie Nouvelle.
If you are interested in exploring Kinshasa, check out Paroisse Sainte Anne (0.2 mi), which is a short walk from Hotel Fortune.
Hotel Fortune looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Kinshasa.

name: Kin Delicieux
description: Kin Delicieux est un rapide décontracté Restaurant, ouvert toute la journée qui représentent tous les plats américains, une cuisine occidentale et spécialité locale de la région. Kin Delicieux est le premier à faire entrer dans la culture de restaurants fast-food à Kinshasa, et depuis, la marque a acquis statut emblématique comme le meilleur restaurant fast food de la ville. Si vous vivez pour la nourriture, c'est l'endroit qu'il vous faut! Comprenant une variété de plats soigneusement cuisinés à la perfection, Kin Delicieux vous donnera envie de plus ! Fidèle à notre nom, nous offrons le meilleur de la classe goût, garanti pour vous prendre sur un roller coaster ride à travers les diverses cuisines nous avons à offrir. Étant un pionnier marque dans l'industrie de la restauration rapide à Kinshasa, notre promesse de 'bonne nourriture pour la vie" prévaut. Le restaurant est toujours prêt et bienvenue à servir que sweet tooth vôtre ! Une boulangerie et de confiserie shop a également été intégré dans notre système afin de satisfaire vos besoins. Nos chefs cuisiniers seront souffler votre esprit avec leurs compétences culinaires et recettes secrètes, celles qui feront de vous demander de plus ! Donc, les gars, manger ce que vous aimez et manger tout ce que vous pouvez à Kin Delicieux, un vrai choix délicieux pour ceux qui vivent de l'amour de la nourriture ! Donc, si vous avez faim, ne cherchez pas plus loin. Choisissez 'dîner dans", "livraison" ou "sortir" et à savourer chaque bouchée de la bonne nourriture!

description:
Les assemblées de l’éternel, ASSET en sigle, sont des églises de Dieu rependues à travers le monde, plus précisément en RD Congo.
Nous sommes porteurs de la Saine Doctrine basées sur le strict respect de la parole de Dieu, dans laquelle les apôtres et les prophètes ont marché.
Les assemblées de l’Eternel ont vu le jour par l’entremise de l’homme de Dieu Docteur Jean-Paul LOKADI-DIAMBA, qui a reçu une vision divine pour mettre en place ces églises de la Saine Doctrine à travers le monde.

name: Hotel Le Cypres
description:
Hotel Le Cypres is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Kinshasa, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Symphonie des Arts (1.7 mi) and Cathédrale Notre-Dame Du Congo (1.7 mi), guests of Hotel Le Cypres can easily experience some of Kinshasa's most well known attractions.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Hotel Le Cypres offer air conditioning, a seating area, and extra long beds.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Guests of Hotel Le Cypres are also welcome to enjoy a lounge, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, parking is available.
When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Limoncello, A Casa Mia, and L'olive Verte Restaurant And Lounge, which are some Mediterranean restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
Enjoy your stay in Kinshasa!
